title: Wrangler Authentics Men's Classic 5-Pocket Regular Fit Cotton Jean
description: REGULAR FIT. This classic five-pocket jean is constructed with a regular fit through the seat and thigh, made to sit at the natural waist
DURABLE MATERIALS. Made with durable flex denim, these jeans are built to last and will allow you to move with comfort throughout the day
FUNCTION MEETS STYLE. From a lunch date to a night out, this stretch denim jean is built for comfort and durability. Designed with a timeless fit, these jeans will be your new closet staple
HEAVY-DUTY HARDWARE. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure and embroidered back pockets
FIVE POCKET STYLING. This jean is constructed with an authentic five pocket styling: (1) watch pocket, (2) front scoop pockets, (3) back patch pockets

100% Cotton Mexico Machine Wash REGULAR FIT. This classic five-pocket jean is constructed with a regular fit through the seat and thigh, made to sit at the natural waist. DURABLE MATERIALS. Built with durable cotton denim, this regular fit jean will hold up over time -- even through long days on the job. FUNCTIONAL COMFORT. Great for long days on the job or working in the yard, this cotton jean keeps you comfortable throughout any task. Made with breathable cotton for a timeless fit and all day comfort. HEAVY-DUTY HARDWARE. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure and embroidered back pockets. FIVE POCKET STYLING. This jean is constructed with an authentic five pocket styling: (1) watch pocket, (2) front scoop pockets, (3) back patch pockets.
